00025 #ifndef CMD4HASH_H
00026 #define CMD4HASH_H
00027 
00028 
00029 #include "ArchSpecific.h"   // Needed for Raw{Peek,Poke}UInt64()
00030 
00031 #include "kademlia/utils/UInt128.h" // Needed for CUInt128
00032 
00033 #include <common/MuleDebug.h>       // Needed for MULE_VALIDATE_PARAMS
00034 
00035 #ifdef USE_WX_EXTENSIONS
00036 #include <common/StringFunctions.h>
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #include <string>
00040 
00041 
00042 const size_t MD4HASH_LENGTH = 16;
00043 
00044 
00054 class CMD4Hash
00055 {
00056 public:
00063     CMD4Hash() {
00064         Clear();
00065     }
00066 
00073     CMD4Hash(const Kademlia::CUInt128& hash) {
00074         byte transitional_array[MD4HASH_LENGTH];
00075         hash.ToByteArray(transitional_array);
00076         SetHash(transitional_array);
00077     }
00078     
00079     ~CMD4Hash() {
00080     }   
00081     
00090     explicit CMD4Hash(const unsigned char hash[]) {
00091         SetHash(hash);
00092     }
00093 
00099     bool operator == (const CMD4Hash& other_hash) const {
00100         return (
00101             ( RawPeekUInt64( m_hash      ) == RawPeekUInt64( other_hash.m_hash      ) ) &&
00102             ( RawPeekUInt64( m_hash + 8  ) == RawPeekUInt64( other_hash.m_hash + 8  ) )
00103         );
00104     }
00105     
00111     bool operator != (const CMD4Hash& other_hash) const {
00112         return !(*this == other_hash);
00113     }
00114 
00123     bool operator  < (const CMD4Hash& other_hash) const {
00124         for ( size_t i = 0; i < MD4HASH_LENGTH; ++i ) {
00125             if ( m_hash[i] < other_hash.m_hash[i] ) {
00126                 return true;
00127             } else if ( other_hash.m_hash[i] < m_hash[i] ) {
00128                 return false;
00129             }
00130         }
00131         
00132         return false;
00133     }
00134 
00135     
00145     bool IsEmpty() const {
00146         return (
00147             !RawPeekUInt64( m_hash      ) &&
00148             !RawPeekUInt64( m_hash + 8  )
00149         );  
00150     }
00151     
00158     void Clear() {
00159         RawPokeUInt64( m_hash,          0 );
00160         RawPokeUInt64( m_hash + 8,      0 );
00161     }
00162 
00163     
00174     bool Decode(const std::string& hash) {
00175         if (hash.length() != MD4HASH_LENGTH * 2) {
00176             return false;
00177         }
00178         
00179         for ( size_t i = 0; i < MD4HASH_LENGTH * 2; i++ ) {
00180             unsigned char word = toupper(hash[i]);
00181 
00182             if ((word >= '0') && (word <= '9')) {
00183                 word -= '0';                
00184             } else if ((word >= 'A') && (word <= 'F')) {
00185                 word -= 'A' - 10;
00186             } else {
00187                 // Invalid chars
00188                 return false;
00189             }
00190             
00191             if (i % 2 == 0) {
00192                 m_hash[i/2] = word << 4;
00193             } else {
00194                 m_hash[i/2] += word;
00195             }
00196         } 
00197 
00198         return true;
00199     }
00200 
00201     #ifdef USE_WX_EXTENSIONS
00202     bool Decode(const wxString& hash) {
00203         return Decode(std::string(unicode2char(hash)));
00204     }
00205     #endif
00206     
00215     std::string EncodeSTL() const {
00216         std::string Base16Buff;
00217 
00218         for ( size_t i = 0; i < MD4HASH_LENGTH*2; i++ ) {
00219             size_t x = ( i % 2 == 0 ) ? ( m_hash[i/2] >> 4 ) : ( m_hash[i/2] & 0xf );
00220 
00221             if ( x <  10 ) {
00222                 Base16Buff += (char)( x + '0' ); 
00223             } else {
00224                 Base16Buff += (char)(  x + ( 'A' - 10 ));
00225             }
00226         }
00227 
00228         return Base16Buff;
00229     }       
00230     
00231     #ifdef USE_WX_EXTENSIONS
00232     wxString Encode() const {
00233         return char2unicode(EncodeSTL().c_str());
00234     }
00235     #endif
00236     
00244     void SetHash(const unsigned char hash[]) {
00245         if ( hash ) {
00246             RawPokeUInt64( m_hash,      RawPeekUInt64( hash ) );
00247             RawPokeUInt64( m_hash + 8,  RawPeekUInt64( hash + 8 ) );
00248         } else {
00249             Clear();
00250         }
00251     }
00252     
00258     unsigned char* GetHash() {
00259         return m_hash;
00260     }
00261     const unsigned char* GetHash() const {
00262         return m_hash;
00263     }
00264     
00271     unsigned char operator[](size_t i) const {
00272         MULE_VALIDATE_PARAMS(i < MD4HASH_LENGTH, wxT("Invalid index in CMD4Hash::operator[]"));
00273         return m_hash[i];
00274     }
00275     
00276     unsigned char& operator[](size_t i) {
00277         MULE_VALIDATE_PARAMS(i < MD4HASH_LENGTH, wxT("Invalid index in CMD4Hash::operator[]"));
00278         return m_hash[i];
00279     }
00280     
00281 private:
00286     unsigned char m_hash[MD4HASH_LENGTH];
00287 };
